name: Untitled Rougelite Dungeon Crawler
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • QE/Left/Right arrow keys to rotate
  • WS/Scroll wheel to navigate menu
  • Left click/Enter to confirm
  • Right click/Backspace to back out
  • Space to interact

HOW TO PLAY

Drag the guys from the side into the bottom slots and click the "Set out button".

Find the exit ladder to go up a floor.

When you reach the 6th floor you will be kicked back to the hub menu.

There is literally nothing to do apart from earn money from killing the same 2 enemies. You can't even spend the money on anything!
